channel.title: Content Developer Needed
channel.description:
Didn't know if this is the wrong section, if so please move.
To explain what I need, and why I need: Currently two of my friends and I are developing a server with the newer protocol revision of 614. Both of them have no experience in programming and run the forums & server while I make it. Now with the time consumption of college, work, personal life, and this. I find that I do not have enough time to develop all that needs to be finished. That's where 'you' come into play. I am looking for someone that knows how to program with java. I need to have someone that gets along with people, is willing to take criticism on improvements, willing to put in time to contribute, and knows what they are doing. Understand that you [b]have to know how to program[/b], and can do it intermediately well.
Examples of things you would be required to do: - Skills - Combat related things (specials, potions, fixes, improvements, etc) - Minigames (I can help with this, but with more people it's easier to develop faster) - Custom/Random material - Other.
Examples of things done recently: Fishing for 614/634: [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/qqelwn.gif[/img] (Emote is wrong, fixed since picture was taken) Bone burying, w/ newer items as proof of loading higher cache: [img]http://i1230.photobucket.com/albums/ee500/Emily-RL/bones.gif[/img]
Please contact me on msn if interested: slayer.love@hotmail.com
You will be required to show your abilities, so come prepared.

item.title: Content Developer Needed
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Diligo Deum:

Is it a possibility you’d pay about $20-$30? If so I’m interested.

You don’t get paid for developing, you only get a share of donations. As my server currently has $65 in donations from the first week. But as I said, you won’t get paid. And money shouldn’t be your motivation. I don’t like money hungry people.

Read full topic

item.title: Content Developer Needed
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:4, topic:393344”]looks good, good luck.

one thing though, why is your fishing spot not in the water ;)[/quote]

I spawned the npc there to test it, I have proper spawn areas now.

@ Nexus_, k sent you a request on msn. Considering to updating to 645 as well.

Read full topic
